title: Pokédex App
description: A responsive JavaScript web app that displays Pokémon data from an external API. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: myFlix API
description: A RESTful API built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB that allows users to access information about movies, directors, and genres.

title: Developer Portfolio
description: A fully responsive personal portfolio website built with HTML and CSS, showcasing web development projects and skills.
